text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to be the MC! The world's greatest! With a clear and 
concise voice! EeeeeeLL Condor Pasaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Umm, El, I think that you're conflating being an MC for a club 
and one for a live performance…

Ohohoho! Be glad that your words 
have the opportunity to benefit me!!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
…No worries. Anyways, since this will be the anniversary 
live performance, I think it would be lovely to conduct 
it in a highly individualistic way.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
For example… I would like to do 
tejime with everyone that comes♪

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
And then! Umm… The next song will be… Hehe… Ehehe!!…Ah, 
I couldn't do it! I just ended up laughing again!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text: Oh, Urara-kun. Is something the matter?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
The anniversary live concert is going to be so big 
and so much fun, right? I'm so excited that when I do 
my "Em See" practice I just end up laughing!

text_block_list.name: TM Opera O
text_block_list.text:
If that is the case, then simply laugh! All of the 
patrons are coming to see you after all! Therefore, 
you should simply act like yourself!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Eh!? Really…!? Then I'll laugh a whole 
bunch while being an "Em See!"
